official_title: To provide access to basic banking services.
short_title: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989

summary.text: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989 - Requires each depository institution to: (1) offer a basic financial services account to low- and moderate-income persons under prescribed guidelines which include specified minimal deposit, balance, and withdrawal requirements; and (2) post a conspicuous notice of the availability of such accounts to its customers. Prescribes administrative enforcement guidelines. Subjects a depository institution to civil liability for noncompliance with this Act.

titles.title: Basic Banking Services Access Act of 1989
To provide access to basic banking services.
